Class CriteriaFinder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.db.CriteriaFinder
public class CriteriaFinder
extends java.lang.Object

This class takes care of executing queries in the database according to a criteria search supplied.

Method Detail

criteriaFind

public suncertify.db.DataInfo[] criteriaFind(suncertify.db.Data database,
                                             java.lang.String criteria)
                                      throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                             DatabaseException
This method searches the database throught the available records and returns an array of DataInfo objects describing all records found in the database which matches the criteria supplied. If record cannot be found, this method returns an empty array. In the event of an invalid field name being privided as part of the criteria this method returns an empty array

Parameters:
database - A Data object indicates the target datafile
criteria - A String indicates the search criteria to match upon for a successful find.
Returns:
DataInfo[] representing an array of matching Record objects
Throws:
DatabaseException - Thrown when database file can not be accessed anymore.
NullPointerException - thrown if the criteria provided is null
java.lang.NullPointerException
DatabaseException

parserCriteria

private java.lang.String[] parserCriteria(java.lang.String criteria)
                                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
Parses the criteria separates its constituent elements, for example: "Carrier='SpeedyAir',Origin airportr='SFO'" yields an array of strings: [ Carrier='SpeedyAir', Origin airport='SFO' ]

Parameters:
criteria - A String indicates the criteria search
Returns:
A String[] object containing the constituents elements of a specific criteria
Throws:
NullPointerException - thrown if the criteria provided is null
java.lang.NullPointerException

isMatching

private boolean isMatching(int recNum,
                           suncertify.db.Data dbFile,
                           java.lang.String[] criteriaItem)
                    throws DatabaseException
Tests if a specific record matches to a search criteria The criteria search is provided in a array of string on the format : [ key1='value1', key2='value2', etc ]

Parameters:
recNum - A int indicates the record number on the database
dbFile - A Data object indicates the target datafile
criteriaItem - A String[] indicates the constituents elements to array-like criteria search on the format [ key1='value1', key2='value2', etc ]
Returns:
A boolean represesenting true, if the record attend to criteria item , return false otherwise
Throws:
DatabaseException - thrown during the access to records of datafile if unnexpected error happened
DatabaseException

getRecordStr

private java.lang.String getRecordStr(int recNum,
                                      suncertify.db.Data dbFile)
                               throws DatabaseException
Puts record into key1='value1'key2='value2'key3='value3'... format and returns it as one large String

Parameters:
recNum - A int indicates the record number on the datafile
dbFile - A Data object indicates the target datafile
Returns:
A String object containing the record read from database in format key1='value'key2='value2'key3='value3'...
Throws:
DatabaseException - thrown during the access to records of datafile
DatabaseException
